titleStmt.title: Orders to be observed at the coronation of the King and Queen Published by order of the Duke of Norfolk, Earl Marshal of England, &c.
titleStmt.author: Norfolk, Henry Howard, Duke of, 1655-1701.
England and Wales. Earl Marshal.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Smith, bookseller in Coven-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Norfolk and Marshal, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Worcester College Library, Oxford.
